title: We’re taking today off
body: We’re taking today off for spring break and to recharge our batteries. We’ll be back on Monday with more stories in the Baltimore Fishbowl.Explore Baltimore Fishbowl Maryland vaccinates more than 1 million residents, reports most daily new COVID cases since Jan. 31 Hogan ‘concerned’ about COVID variants, says Maryland's rising cases are unrelated to recently eased restrictions Honey I shrunk the sculptures: Kinetic race returns, in miniature and safe from COVID-19 Contents of the Milton Inn going up for auction this week "Crazy as a Bedbug": A Tour of Historic Belvedere Hotel Suicides John Waters's list of 11 best movies of 2020
